keyword: how many calories in tonic water
title: How Many Calories in Tonic Water?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in tonic water per 200ml serving, including carbs, sugars, sodium, and comparisons to diet versions for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in Tonic Water?
assumptions: Regular tonic water, carbonated, sweetened with sugar; standard brand values like Schweppes; no alcohol or mixers added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, regular vs. diet, added flavors, and serving size. Diet versions have 0 kcal. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 200ml serving of regular tonic water contains about 70 kcal, primarily from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 oz fresh lime juice per 200ml

faqs.q: How many calories in a 200ml glass of tonic water?
faqs.a: About 70 kcal for regular tonic water.
Regular has 35 kcal per 100ml from sugars; diet versions are 0 kcal.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in tonic water?
faqs.a: Approximately 8.5g carbs (all sugars) per 100ml, or 17g per 200ml serving.
Yes, about 12mg per 100ml from added minerals and quinine.

faqs.q: How many calories in a can of tonic water?
faqs.a: A standard 355ml can has around 124 kcal; varies by brand.
